name: Survival Tiles
description:
THIS IS A SUPER EARLY PROTOTYPE, IT COULD BE DROPPED AT ANY MOMENT. DON'T COUNT ON ANYTHING FROM THIS, UNLESS STATED OTHERWISE IN THE FUTURE. thanks :D Controls

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump / Swim -Spacebar

Break Block - Left Click

Place Block - Right Click

Spawn Water - While holding Shift, press or hold Spacebar

Toggle Inventory - Escape
